Predicate.Description: If XON.10 (Organization Identifier) is not valued
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued )
If XON.10 (Organization Identifier) is not valued
If XTN.7 (Local Number) is not valued
If XTN.4 (Email Address) is not valued

Constraint.Description: CX.1 (ID Number) shall not be valued with a Social Security Number.
If CE.3 (Name of Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CE.1 (Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
If CE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
If CE.1 (Identifier) is valued then CE.3 (Name of Coding System) shall not be empty.
If ( CE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued ) then CE.5 (Alternate Text) shall not be empty.
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued ) then CWE.9 (Original Text) shall not be empty.
If CWE.1 (Identifier) is valued then CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) shall not be empty.
If ( TS.1 (Time) is valued AND TS.1 (Time) does not contain the value '0000'. ) then TS.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]]+/-ZZZZ'.
HD.1 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'CDC-EPI Surv Branch' (Case Insensitive).
If SN.1 (Comparator) is valued then SN.1 (Comparator) shall contain one of the following values: '<=', '>=', '<>', '<', '>', '='.
If SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) is valued then SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) shall contain one of the of the following values: '+', '-', '/', '.', ':'.
If ( TS.1 (Time) is valued AND TS.1 (Time) does not contain the value '0000'. ) then TS.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
If HD.3 (Universal ID Type) contains the value 'ISO', then HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]]+/-ZZZZ'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
If CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) contains the value 'LN' (Case Sensitive), then CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
If CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) contains the value 'LN' (Case Sensitive), then CWE.1 (Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
HD.1 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'US WHO Collab LabSys' (Case Insensitive).
If HD.3 (Universal ID Type) contains the value 'CLIA', then HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with a CLIA identifier.
If HD.3 (Universal ID Type) contains the value 'ISO', then HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
If CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CWE.1 (Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
If CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
CX.1 (ID Number) shall not be valued with a Social Security Number.
CX.1 (ID Number) shall not be valued with a Social Security Number.
If HD.3 (Universal ID Type) contains the value 'CLIA', then HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with a CLIA identifier.
If HD.3 (Universal ID Type) contains the value 'ISO', then HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
HD.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['ISO','CLIA'].
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued ) then CWE.9 (Original Text) shall not be empty.
If CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CWE.1 (Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
If CWE.1 (Identifier) is valued then CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) shall not be empty.
If CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) contains the value 'LN', then CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) shall be valued with a LOINC code.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) contains the value 'G', then OBR-26.1.1 (Identifier) shall not be empty.

If ( OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X', AND OBX-2 (Value Type) contains one of the values in the list: ['SN','NM']. ) then ( OBX-6.1 (Identifier) shall not be empty, OR OBX-6.4 (Alternate Identifier) shall not be empty. )
If ( OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X', AND At least one occurrence of OBX-5 (Observation Value) is valued ) then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall not be empty.

If ( All occurrences of OBX-5 (Observation Value) are not valued AND OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X'. ) then at least one occurrence of OBX-8.1 (Identifier) shall not be empty.
If PID-33 (Last Update Date/Time) is valued then PID-34.2 (Universal ID) shall not be empty.
The second occurrence of MSH-21.3 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '2.16.840.1.113883.9.179'.
If At least one occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) contains the value 'PHLabReport-Ack' (Case Insensitive), then MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'AL'.
( MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&', OR MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&#'. )
The second occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'PHLIP_ELSM_251' (Case Insensitive).
The first occurrence of MSH-21.3 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '2.16.840.1.113883.9.11'.

If ( All occurrences of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) does not contain the value 'PHLabReport-Ack' (Case Insensitive), AND MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) are valued ) then MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.

The first occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'PHLabReport-Ack' (Case Insensitive), OR The first occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'PHLabReport-NoAck' (Case Insensitive).
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) should be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.NTE-1 (Set ID - NTE) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.

If ( PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC are valued AND At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-16 (Ordering Provider) are valued ) then all occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.1 (ID Number) shall be identical to All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-16.1 (ID Number)
If All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.2.1 (Time) are not valued then PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-8.1 (Time) shall be empty.

If ( PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC is valued AND PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) is valued ) then PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-2.1 (Entity Identifier) shall be identical to PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-2.1 (Entity Identifier)
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.NTE-1 (Set ID - NTE) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.

( PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-7.1 (Time) shall be identical to At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.1.1 (Time) AND PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-7.1 (Time) shall be identical to All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-14.1 (Time) )

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.2 (Range End Date/Time) is valued then PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-8.1 (Time) shall be identical to At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.2.1 (Time)
If PATIENT_RESULT.PATIENT.PID-7 (Date/Time of Birth) is not valued then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-3.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value '21612-7'.
All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.PATIENT.NTE-1 (Set ID - NTE) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
